The attribute `android:allowBackup` is deprecated from Android 12 and higher and may be removed in future versions. Consider adding the attribute `android:dataExtractionRules` specifying an `@xml` resource which configures cloud backups and device transfers on Android 12 and higher.

Manually populating or sending TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED events should be avoided. They may be ignored on certain versions of Android. Prefer setting UI metadata using `View.onInitializeAccessibilityNodeInfo`, `Activity.setTitle`, `ViewCompat.setAccessibilityPaneTitle`, etc. to inform users of crucial changes to the UI.

Manually populating or sending TYPE_WINDOW_STATE_CHANGED events should be avoided. They may be ignored on certain versions of Android.
